messages.subject: Research Genealogy Not History, perhaps --- Re: Respuesta: [samuraihistory] Miura
messages.msgSnippet: ... How much research have you two done for yourselves? Your request sounds more like a family search than a history search. Have you talked to your own family
messages.messageBody:
--- Masami Hatano <thatano@...> wrote:

>
> Forget it, I tried to find out about my family too!
>
>
>
> Masami
>


How much research have you two done for yourselves? Your request sounds
more like a family search than a history search. Have you talked to
your own family members yet? Perhaps also the Japanese embassy in your
respective countries might be of some assistance with resources, but I
don't think they would conduct your research for you.

Best of good fortune to you,

Lizzie






__________________________________

> I am from Yokohama though Living in Irapuato Mexico I am the last
of the Miura Of my family.
> My Uncle and Mother showed me our family crest, its the one in the
archives as Miura I would realy like to know more about Miura.
>
